questions.question: Which FME Server component runs FME Workspaces?
The FME Server Core and Engine(s) are required to be installed on the same computer.
Which of the following is NOT an example of an FME Server Web Service?
I have an FME Server with two engines. Four users submit jobs at the same time. What happens?
options: Two jobs are processed. Two jobs are returned to their authors.
Two jobs are processed. The other two sit in a queue until an engine becomes free.
Two extra engines will fire up automatically to process all four jobs.
The four jobs will be processed simultaneously, sharing the two engines.
